insights.title: Peak Usage Hours
insights.description: Most chat activity occurs between 9-11 AM and 2-4 PM

insights.title: Growing Interest in Contract Analysis
insights.description: Questions about contract analysis have increased 35% this month

insights.title: Users Prefer Shorter Responses
insights.description: Messages under 200 words receive 45% higher satisfaction ratings

response_data.summary: Overall chat engagement is high with users actively seeking legal document assistance. Peak usage aligns with business hours, and there's growing demand for contract analysis features.
recommendations: Consider adding more contract analysis templates
Optimize response length to 150-200 words for better engagement
Schedule system maintenance outside peak hours (9-11 AM, 2-4 PM)
Develop specialized workflows for legal document processing
